languages.text: Один из снарядов бьет меня в грудь и повергает на землю. Я успеваю сгруппироваться и тем избегаю ран, но встаю с разъяренным клекотом. Я был низвергнут — несмываемое оскорбление!
One of the projectiles hits me in the chest and throws me to the ground. I manage to regroup and avoid injury, but get up with a furious screech. I was cast down — an indelible insult!
languages.original_text: Один из снарядов бьет меня в грудь и повергает на землю. Я успеваю сгруппироваться и тем избегаю ран, но встаю с разъяренным клекотом. Я был низвергнут — несмываемое оскорбление!

traits.locale_text: One of the projectiles hits me in the chest and throws me to the ground. I managed to regroup and avoid injury, but get up with a furious screech. I was cast down, an unforgivable insult!
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: One of the projectiles hits me in the chest and throws me to the ground. I manage to regroup and avoid injury, but get up with a furious screech. I was cast down — an indelible insult!
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: そのうちの1発が私の胸に命中し、地面に投げ出された。何とか体勢を立て直し、怪我は免れたが、猛烈な金切り声を上げて立ち上がった。やられた。忘れがたい侮辱だ！
languages.original_text: One of the projectiles hits me in the chest and throws me to the ground. I manage to regroup and avoid injury, but get up with a furious screech. I was cast down — an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: そのうちの1発が私の胸に命中し、地面に投げ出された。何とか体勢を立て直し、怪我は免れたが、猛烈な金切り声を上げて立ち上がった。やられた。許しがたい侮辱だ！
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 其中一块碎片击中了我的胸部，将我打翻在地。我立刻想办法调整身姿，避免受伤，但还是摔得很狼狈。我尖叫着站起身来，猎物竟敢对我动手？这简直是不可饶恕的侮辱！
languages.original_text: One of the projectiles hits me in the chest and throws me to the ground. I manage to regroup and avoid injury, but get up with a furious screech. I was cast down — an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: 其中一块碎片击中了我的胸部，将我打倒在地。我立刻想办法调整身姿，避免受伤，但还是摔得很狼狈。我尖叫着站起身来，猎物竟敢对我动手？这简直是不可饶恕的侮辱！
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Uno de los proyectiles me alcanza en el pecho y me tira al suelo. Consigo recuperarme y evitar heridas, pero me levanto con un chillido furioso. Me han derribado, ¡es un insulto intolerable!
languages.original_text: One of the projectiles hits me in the chest and throws me to the ground. I manage to regroup and avoid injury, but get up with a furious screech. I was cast down — an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: Uno de los proyectiles me alcanza en el pecho y me tira al suelo. Consigo recuperarme y evitar heridas, pero me levanto con un chillido furioso. Me han derribado, ¡es un insulto imperdonable!
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Eines der Projektile trifft meine Brust und wirft mich zu Boden. Ich kann mich sammeln und eine Verletzung vermeiden, stehe aber mit einem wütenden Kreischen auf. Ich wurde zu Boden geworfen ... eine unverzeihliche Beleidigung!
languages.original_text: One of the projectiles hits me in the chest and throws me to the ground. I manage to regroup and avoid injury, but get up with a furious screech. I was cast down — an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: Eines der Projektile trifft mich in der Brust und wirft mich zu Boden. Ich konnte mich sammeln und eine Verletzung vermeiden, stehe aber mit einem wütenden Kreischen auf. Ich wurde zu Boden geworfen, eine unverzeihliche Beleidigung!
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: L'un des projectiles me touche au niveau du torse et me projette à terre. Je parviens tant bien que mal à me relever, sans pouvoir retenir un hurlement furieux. J'ai été forcé d'atterrir ! C'est une insulte impardonnable !
languages.original_text: One of the projectiles hits me in the chest and throws me to the ground. I manage to regroup and avoid injury, but get up with a furious screech. I was cast down — an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: L'un des projectiles me touche au niveau du torse et me projette à terre. Je parviens tant bien que mal à me relever, sans pouvoir retenir un hurlement furieux. J'ai été forcé d'atterrir ! C'est une insulte impardonnable !
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Fırlayan nesnelerden biri göğsüme çarpıp beni yere indiriyor. Kendimi toparlamayı ve yara almamayı başarıyorum ancak ayağa kalkarken öfkeli bir feryat koparıyorum. Yere indirildim. Tahammül edilemez bir hakaret!
languages.original_text: One of the projectiles hits me in the chest and throws me to the ground. I manage to regroup and avoid injury, but get up with a furious screech. I was cast down — an indelible insult!

traits.locale_text: Fırlayan nesnelerden biri göğsüme çarpıyor ve beni yere indiriyor. Kendimi toparlamayı ve yara almamayı başarıyorum ancak ayağa kalkarken öfkeli bir feryat koparıyorum. Yere indirildim. Tahammül edilemez bir hakaret!
traits.speaker: Player
